ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
They quickly begin to shrink back into [npc.her] head until only a hole is left. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.earFullDescriptionColour] quickly grows to cover them, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, they're made out of [npc.earFullDescription], #ENDIF and as the transformation finishes, [npc.she] [npc.verb(notice)] [npc.her] hearing hasn't been affected at all. #IF(game.isSillyModeEnabled()) You suddenly feel like listening to jazz music. #ENDIF
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldBee(internal, bee-like ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of internal,#IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF bee-like ears, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
